name: Lambertus Robben
description: I’m 36, from the Netherlands, living in Germany, and I started the EUMS brand to help people understand the EU better after Brexit showed me how little most of us really know about it.

name: Elliot Baudeweyns
description: Hey! I'm Elliot — a Dutch student in Poland with a passion for politics, international relations, and digital spaces, working at EU Made Simple to strengthen informed democracies by interviewing experts, connecting like-minded groups, and representing the platform beyond its videos.

name: Paul Bekaert
description: I’m 22, from France, and I am European. I really got into EU politics after the Russian invasion of Ukraine, and since then, I’ve been dedicated to making European politics more accessible.

name: Jonathan Reinders
description: Hi! I'm Jonathan from Munich — a Spanish-socialized German with Austrian humor, living in Italy, looking like a Swede, loving the Balkans, passionate about languages, sports, and storytelling, and working at EUMS to explore the 450 million lives across 27 countries that make up Europe.
